trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class is an exception thrown by the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> method to indicate that the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> Ã¨ un'eccezione generata dal metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> per indicare che il server ha restituito un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> con un errore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class using the specified response object.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> utilizzando l'oggetto risposta specificato.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.String)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> utilizzando il messaggio specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object returned by the server.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse,System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> object using the specified response object and message.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse,System.String)" /> crea un'istanza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> utilizzando l'oggetto risposta e il messaggio specificati.

trans-unit.source: Data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Dati necessari per serializzare il parametro.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: L'origine e la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato al parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> utilizzando le informazioni di serializzazione e il contesto di flusso specificati.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Eventuale proprietÃ <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> che ha generato l'eccezione.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> restituito dal server.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse,System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> class using the specified response object, message, and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse,System.String,System.Exception)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException" /> utilizzando l'oggetto risposta, il messaggio e l'eccezione interna specificati.

trans-unit.source: Data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Dati necessari per serializzare il parametro.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: L'origine e la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato al parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> method populates the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data required to serialize the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> popola l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> con i dati necessari per serializzare il parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.Response" /> property specifies the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object returned by the server that contains an error.
trans-unit.target: La proprietÃ <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryOperationException.Response" /> specifica l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> restituito dal server che contiene un errore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object returned by the server that contains an error.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> restituito dal server che contiene un errore.
